programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Livid Over a Loan
programme.desc: Jill is suing Laura after failing to repay a loan, but Laura says it was a gift.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Threw Me Out Of Your Taxi
programme.desc: Allison is suing the taxi driver she hired to drive her home after a medical procedure for kicking her out.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Judge And Defendant Go Head To Head
programme.desc: Wilda is suing her neighbor for the cost of stolen speakers and $3,000 for harassment.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Dog Death Dilemma
programme.desc: Miguel is suing his friend of 30 years because he believes the defendant is the cause of his dog's death.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Sketchy Boyfriend / Sketchy Loan
programme.desc: LaToya wants her ex-boyfriend to pay her back for the rental car after finding out he cheated on her.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Car Crash Crisis
programme.desc: Kathy is suing truck driver Doug for vehicular damages after claiming he illegally passed her on the right.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Did a Dad's Punishment Go Too Far?
programme.desc: Sabrina is suing her child's father after claiming he threw a man-tantrum and broke their son's tablet.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Are 58 Trying to Date A 22-Year-Old!
programme.desc: Robert is suing his young fling Latasha after claiming she damaged his property.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Your Baby Is White - I Can't Be The Father!
programme.desc: Kianna found pics of naked women in Nick’s phone and condoms and cologne in his gym bag. Is he cheating?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Outrageous Merry Maury Updates!
programme.desc: Maury is celebrating the holidays with stories of past guests that came for tests, lie detectors and more.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: DNA Will Prove Your Husband Got Me Pregnant...Twice!
programme.desc: Kayla and Bruce took a home DNA test that said Bruce was not the father of her baby, but she refuses to believe that test, so they’ll settle it today! Chaundra and Holly suspect Christian the father of their 4 kids! Did Rikki cheat on his wife twice?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 3 Teen Moms... 3 Babies... Is One Man the Father? Part 1
programme.desc: Shankel is desperate to prove that Dana is her baby's father. Shawnteeonah swears Terrell is her baby's father. They have babies and they have questions. Only Maury has all the answers. Explosive paternity results on today's MAURY.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Stop My 47 Year Old Dad from Marrying a Teenager!
programme.desc: One mother Is furious that her 48 year old daughter is going to marry a 19 year old man. Then, one father is making his son and daughter furious because he's now dating his son's ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Test Me! I Didn't Get Those 3 Women Pregnant
programme.desc: These 3 women have a few things in common: 1) they all slept with the same man 2) they all claim he is the father of their baby 3) they all agree he is a deadbeat father 4) they want him to step up and accept his responsibllities.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: It's On Facebook...Did You Cheat and Have A Baby?
programme.desc: These guests say their loved ones are cheating behind their backs. But who cheated? How many times? And can they handle the results? Plus, one person shared a little too much information on Facebook and now will have to pass a lie detector test to prove they've been faithful.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm Only 16 ... I'll Prove Your Boyfriend Is My Baby's Dad!
programme.desc: 16 year old Shanetta is here to prove to Ken Ken that he is the father of her child. Will he finally own up to his responsibilities? Then, Megan has already tested Kayton for one child, now she's back to test him again for her 2nd baby.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm 17...Which of These Boys is My Baby's Dad?
programme.desc: These denying dads are in for a healthy dose of truth and these mad moms are ready to find out once and for all who's the real father of their children. But after the results are read, who will be jumping for joy?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You're a Gold Digger...My Man is Not Your Baby's Father!
programme.desc: Did Charlotte and Tasheun have Brandon's babies? Will Tanya prove Craig Jr. fathered Craig III?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Cheated And Had A Threesome...That Baby Isn't Mine!
programme.desc: Lashonda had a one-night stand with her neighbor. Now he and his girlfriend are denying that he fathered her child! Then, Andrea wanted to get back at her cheating husband Troy, so she had a threesome with his friend! So who’s Troy Jr.’s father?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: The DNA Will Make You Pay…You Are The Father!
programme.desc: Is John the father of Rhonda’s daughter? Tiffany won’t marry her fiancé Rio until she knows he’s the father, but he says he is sterile! Then, Wendie wants to prove that James fathered their toddler daughter, but James denies it!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Our 5 Babies Need DNA Tests ... Who's Their Dad?
programme.desc: Seniqua was furious that Prince denied her baby. But when Prince started dating her sister, the fireworks really started. Megan wants Eric to be a father to the daughter he denies.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Told the Baby Wasn't Mine in the Delivery Room; Exes Fight Like Cats Over a Dog
programme.desc: A man finds out he may not be the father of his newly born child; a woman wants joint custody of her ex-boyfriend's dog.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Daughter ... You're Dead to Me; Unlock Your Phone & Get a DNA Test
programme.desc: Ashley doesn't believe that her mother, Regina, respects or protected her; Tazz accuses his wife, Sierra, of cheating and doesn't think her 1-year-old son is his.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: Stop Denying Your Daughter!; Unlock: I Can Smell the Cheating
programme.desc: Lizzy says that every time she breaks up with her boyfriend, Heem, he denies being the father of her daughter; accused of infidelity, Dennis says he suspects that girlfriend Deedee is cheating with her brother.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: You Cheated 12 Times; Best Friend Confession
programme.desc: Despite Marco's philandering ways, Jocelyn wants to make their relationship work; Auriel thought she could trust her best friend, London, until she caught her talking to her boyfriend, Money.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Help! My Daughter Is Naked On The Internet / DNA: Someone Else Was In My Bed!
programme.desc: Kristie is shocked by a video of Erica and her boyfriend, Cullen, while Erica resents her interference; Jamaine, suspicious of Alicia's fidelity, doubts he's the father of her son.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: I Already Took A Lie Detector Test / Is It Too Late To Be Your Father?
programme.desc: Jalen is convinced that his girlfriend, Sade, had sex with members of his family as well as his friends! Then, Javon claims that his father, Jim, disappeared early on in his life. But 20 years later, Jim has resurfaced and now wants to reconnect.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Is The Baby Mine? / DNA Mystery: Met My Sister At Dad’s Funeral?
programme.desc: Mike admits to having trust issues with his girlfriend, her constant disappearing act during their relationship has him doubting whether this baby is his! Next, Charlette found out at her father’s funeral that a woman named Hope, is her sister.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Teens In Trouble
programme.desc: Ronesha is an aggrieved mother who claims that her daughter has been nothing but trouble since the pandemic.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Phone: My Coworkers Say You Cheat / Unlock The Phone: Why Do You Keep Deleting?
programme.desc: Cristal says that her husband listens to baseless rumors about her, and he suspects that she's cheating!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock Her Phone: She Has A Double Life/ Family In Crisis: Mom Abandoned Me
programme.desc: Dwayne believes that his wife exhibits suspicious behavior. He thinks it’s because she is cheating on him.
